Hi! I am a PhD student in the Stat&CS program at Bocconi University, where I was advised by Prof. Luca Trevisan, lately I’ve been co-advised by Prof. Salil Vadhan and Prof. Alon Rosen.

I like interesting mathematical questions motivated by the theory of computing, which are usually tagged with Algorithms, Computational Complexity Theory, Pseudorandomness, Combinatorics.

You can reach me at  jiyu dot zhang at phd dot unibocconi dot it
